description: This file defines a React component for handling OAuth callback from Confluence. It manages the OAuth authorization response, displays success or error messages, and redirects the user accordingly.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: A React component that wraps the inner OAuth callback component in a Suspense boundary to handle asynchronous operations gracefully.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: A React component that processes the OAuth callback parameters, updates the UI based on success or failure, and redirects the user accordingly.
